[[inst_hl_lhi]]
==== HL.LHI

*Syntax:* hl.lhi [SrcL, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lhi.svg[HL.LHI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/LONG
